phrs.translation: 大方的, 最自由, 自由的, 免费的

sentences.sentence: It is me that freest in company, you all should learn from me.
sentences.translation: 现在公司最清闲的是我，要向我学习。

sentences.sentence: Gauguin was one of the boldest, one of the freest artists around.
sentences.translation: 高更是当时最大胆、自由的艺术家之一。

sentences.sentence: And we come here to state as strongly as ever, this is the freest city in the world.
sentences.translation: 我们来到这里，也是一如既往地，坚定宣告，这是世界上最自由的城市。
